examples.example: 我捐出了一毛钱，也为公益事业贡献了一份小小的力量。

translate.english: I donated ten cents and also contributed a small amount of strength to the public welfare cause.

examples.example: 虽然这只是一毛钱，但它也代表着我的一份心意。

translate.english: Although this is just ten cents, it also represents a portion of my intention.

examples.example: 我在路上捡到一毛钱，把它放进了爱心捐款箱。

translate.english: I picked up ten cents on the road and put it into the love donation box.
